DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Uric Acid Result Unspecified Upper Limit of Normal Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the top value, units of measure not specified, of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern renal lab for uric acid, a white tasteless odorless crystalline product of protein metabolism, found in the blood and urine,  as well as trace amounts found in the various organs of the body.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the result of the medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood or urine for uric acid, a white tasteless odorless crystalline product of protein metabolism.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: A white tasteless odorless crystalline product of protein metabolism, found in the blood and urine, as well as trace amounts found in the various organs of the body. It can build up and form stones or crystals in various disease states:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: A white tasteless odorless crystalline product of protein metabolism, found in the blood and urine, as well as trace amounts found in the various organs of the body. It can build up and form stones or crystals in various disease states.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Uric Acid Lab Unspecified Upper Limit of Normal Value
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for uric acid (units not specified).

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Unspecified Upper Limit of Normal Value
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.:The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Not stated explicitly or in detail.
The top value of the range of statistical characteristics that are supposed to represent accepted standard, non-pathological pattern for particular laboratory result or other quantitative parameter.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
